original_text: not like Moses, who would put a veil over his face so that the Israelites might not gaze at the outcome of what was being brought to an end.
korean_text: 우리는 모세가 이스라엘 자손들에게 장차 없어질 것의 결국을 주목하지 못하게 하려고 수건을 그 얼굴에 쓴 것 같이 아니하노라

sentences.original_text: who would put a veil over his face
so that the Israelites might not gaze
at the outcome of what was being brought to an end
